verbose_text: We have previously shown in a context of scaling and homogeneous growth that a power-law relationship for C0 with tissue size implies that the proliferation rate gcell of each cell in the tissue is proportional to the normalized time derivative (C cell / Ccell) of the cellular level of BMP signaling, according to the equation gcell = ~ ((1+ epsilon)/q) (C cell / Ccell) (see XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY for Theoretical Framework).
